description:
Efficiency is the name of the game with the Ceramic FluxRing cookpot. An integrated heat exchanger increases the heated area to reduce boiling times and fuel used, and the ceramic non-stick coating is quick and easy when it comes to cleaning. Spend more time enjoying camp and less time hungry.

  • Made of hard-anodized aluminum with a ceramic non-stick coating
  • Integrated FluxRing heat exchanger ensures rapid boiling times
  • Silicone-coated wire handle and insulated cozy for easy handling
  • Requires pot support when cooking on compatible Jetboil systems (sold separately)
name: Jetboil Ceramic Fluxring 1.5L Cookpot
